description: Everything you'd every want to know about beards, whether it be totally useless, historical, or downright hysterical! Test your knowledge for fun.  Test your friends knowledge to humiliate them! Get everyone on board the beard express!  Use it as a great educational tool for those less beard-savvy family or friends.
name: BeardTrivia
shortDescription: Test your knowledge of beards with this fun and factual beard trivia game!
